content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_boat
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_jungle_wood", "quantity": 2, "index": 10}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 46, "index": 17}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_carpet", "quantity": 11, "index": 26}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 53, "index": 33}, {"type": "barrel", "quantity": 57, "index": 35}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 41, "index": 37}, {"type": "diorite_stairs", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}, {"type": "ocelot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 30, "index": 40}]

thought: To craft jungle_boat, I need to craft jungle_planks. To craft jungle_planks, I need to place a stripped_jungle_wood in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will move the stripped_jungle_wood from slot 10 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 10 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_boat
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 46, "index": 17}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_carpet", "quantity": 11, "index": 26}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 53, "index": 33}, {"type": "barrel", "quantity": 57, "index": 35}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 41, "index": 37}, {"type": "diorite_stairs", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}, {"type": "ocelot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 30, "index": 40}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the jungle_planks, I need to move them from the crafting slot to my inventory.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_boat
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 46, "index": 17}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_carpet", "quantity": 11, "index": 26}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 53, "index": 33}, {"type": "barrel", "quantity": 57, "index": 35}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 41, "index": 37}, {"type": "diorite_stairs", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}, {"type": "ocelot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 30, "index": 40}]

thought: To craft a jungle boat, I first need to make jungle planks. The recipe for jungle planks is to place one stripped jungle log in the crafting table. There is one stripped jungle log in slot 10 so I will move it to the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 10 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_boat
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 46, "index": 17}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_carpet", "quantity": 11, "index": 26}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 53, "index": 33}, {"type": "barrel", "quantity": 57, "index": 35}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 41, "index": 37}, {"type": "diorite_stairs", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}, {"type": "ocelot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 30, "index": 40}]
thought: Now that the jungle planks have been crafted, I can move them into my inventory to save them for later. I choose slot 12 because it is empty.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_boat
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 46, "index": 17}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_carpet", "quantity": 11, "index": 26}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 53, "index": 33}, {"type": "barrel", "quantity": 57, "index": 35}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 41, "index": 37}, {"type": "diorite_stairs", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}, {"type": "ocelot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 30, "index": 40}]
thought: To craft a jungle boat, I need to place three jungle planks in a U shape. I have four jungle planks in my inventory, so I will start by moving one to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_boat
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 46, "index": 17}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_carpet", "quantity": 11, "index": 26}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 53, "index": 33}, {"type": "barrel", "quantity": 57, "index": 35}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 41, "index": 37}, {"type": "diorite_stairs", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}, {"type": "ocelot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 30, "index": 40}]
thought: Next, I will move another jungle plank to slot 3, which is directly below slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_boat
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 46, "index": 17}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_carpet", "quantity": 11, "index": 26}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 53, "index": 33}, {"type": "barrel", "quantity": 57, "index": 35}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 41, "index": 37}, {"type": "diorite_stairs", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}, {"type": "ocelot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 30, "index": 40}]
thought: Finally, I will move the third jungle plank to slot 4, which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_boat
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 46, "index": 17}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_carpet", "quantity": 11, "index": 26}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 53, "index": 33}, {"type": "barrel", "quantity": 57, "index": 35}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 41, "index": 37}, {"type": "diorite_stairs", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}, {"type": "ocelot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 30, "index": 40}]
thought: I still need one more jungle plank to complete the U shape, so I will move it to slot 5, which is to the right of slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_boat
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 46, "index": 17}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_carpet", "quantity": 11, "index": 26}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 53, "index": 33}, {"type": "barrel", "quantity": 57, "index": 35}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 41, "index": 37}, {"type": "diorite_stairs", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}, {"type": "ocelot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 30, "index": 40}]
thought: Now that all the ingredients are in the correct positions, I can craft the jungle boat by moving it to slot 6.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 6 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_boat
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 46, "index": 17}, {"type": "blue_stained_glass", "quantity": 2, "index": 25}, {"type": "red_carpet", "quantity": 11, "index": 26}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 53, "index": 33}, {"type": "barrel", "quantity": 57, "index": 35}, {"type": "furnace", "quantity": 41, "index": 37}, {"type": "diorite_stairs", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}, {"type": "ocelot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 30, "index": 40}]
thought: Finally, I will move the crafted jungle boat to an empty slot in my inventory (eg., slot 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
